import React from "react"; import { Container, Accordion } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./ProgramMaster.css"; const ProgramMaster: React.FC = () => { return (

Master Degree

The Master of Science (M.Sc.) program in Computer Science is designed to provide advanced knowledge and skills in various areas of computer science, preparing students for both professional careers and further academic pursuits.

Program Overview

{" "} {/* Centered on mobile, left on desktop */} {/* Program Structure */} Program Structure

The curriculum complies with the Announcement of The Commission on Higher Education Standard on the subject of Criteria and Standards of Graduate Studies Program B. E. 2565, Master Degree, and offers two plans:

  • {programOverview.programStructure.plan1_1.name}: {" "} {programOverview.programStructure.plan1_1.details} ( {programOverview.programStructure.plan1_1.credits})
  • {programOverview.programStructure.plan1_2.name}: {" "} {programOverview.programStructure.plan1_2.details} ( {programOverview.programStructure.plan1_2.credits})
{/* Research Areas */} Research Areas Our program covers diverse research areas in Polymer Science and Technology, including:
  • Multifunctional polymers and composite development for diverse industries
  • Innovative sustainable material design and processing
  • Advanced natural rubber and biopolymer development
  • Micro- and nano-structural studies of soft matter
Students work on cutting-edge projects under the guidance of experienced faculty members. {/* Admission Requirements */} Admission Requirements
